SVGAnimatedNumberAnimVal.summary: The animVal read-only property of the interface represents the animated value of an SVG element's numeric attribute.

remarks.para: Some animatable SVG attributes accept a single number, such as the {{SVGAttr("radius")}} attribute of the circle or ellipse elements and the {{SVGAttr("width")}} and {{SVGAttr("height")}} attributes of the rect element, and many others. The animVal attribute provides access to the current animated value of the animatable numeric attribute during animations.

SVGAnimatedNumberAnimVal.value: A number; the current value of the animated attribute as a float.
